title: Letter from Geographer
marks: Signature and Mark Lower left: [ 籬島] {Ritō}
description: twenty eight total lines of carefully, delicately written cursive; the last two lines (at L) are spaced far from the previous text; the third line from L is short (signature); written on long rectangular paper with light grey fibers
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Doris Wiener
